title: Server Migration - External Project
subTitle: This is a subtitle
description: I successfully managed the migration of the email server and cloud storage systems from Google Email and Network Attached Storage (NAS) to Microsoft solutions for Calibre Business Advisory. This project involved meticulous planning and coordination to ensure a smooth transition, minimising downtime and disruption to the organisation's operations. Throughout the migration process, I implemented best practices to safeguard data integrity and security while providing training and support to staff to help them adapt to the new Microsoft environment effectively.

jd: Migrated email server from Google to Microsoft Exchange.
Set up security policies in Office 365.
Migrated storage server from NAS to Microsoft OneDrive and SharePoint.
Conducted unit testing and integration testing.
Wrote technical documentation and end-user manuals.
